:duration.description: Scroll to the top of the time.

:visibleHeight.description: When scrolling to this height, a back-to-top button appears.
:visibleHeight.description_zh: 当滚动到这个高度时，显示返回顶部按钮。

easing.description: Scroll to the top easing mode, all types: easing.
easing.description_zh: 滚动到顶部的缓动方式类型, 所有类型：easing。

target.description: Set the element to listen for its scrolling events, with a value of a function that returns the corresponding DOM element.
target.description_zh: 设置需要监听其滚动事件的元素，值为一个返回对应 DOM 元素的函数。

events.name: onClick
events.description: Click the callback function when you return to the top.
events.description_zh: 点击返回顶部时的回调函数。
